mapper.insert:
replace into after_sale_return_order (platform_order_sn, platform_order_goods_sn, after_sale_reason, shipping_name, tracking_number, shop_name, outer_id, goods_name, sku_name, platform_goods_id, platform_goods_name, style_value, goods_sub_type, after_sales_type,pre_after_sales_type, after_sales_status, warehouse_id, warehouse_name, goods_number, quantity, refund_created_time, return_order_created_time, refund_id,order_sn,is_manual,return_status,order_goods_id,refund_updated_time) VALUES
(#{order.platformOrderSn}, #{order.platformOrderGoodsSn}, #{order.afterSaleReason}, #{order.shippingName}, #{order.trackingNumber}, #{order.shopName}, #{order.outerId}, #{order.goodsName}, #{order.skuName}, #{order.platformGoodsId}, #{order.platformGoodsName}, #{order.styleValue}, #{order.goodsSubType}, #{order.afterSalesType}, #{order.preAfterSalesType},#{order.afterSalesStatus}, #{order.warehouseId}, #{order.warehouseName}, #{order.goodsNumber}, #{order.quantity}, #{order.refundCreatedTime}, #{order.returnOrderCreatedTime}, #{order.refundId},#{order.orderSn},#{order.isManual},#{order.returnStatus},#{order.orderGoodsId},#{order.refundUpdatedTime})
mapper.select: select order_id, platform_order_sn, platform_order_goods_sn, after_sale_reason, shipping_name, tracking_number, shop_name, outer_id, goods_name, sku_name, platform_goods_id, platform_goods_name, style_value, goods_sub_type, after_sales_type, pre_after_sales_type, after_sales_status, warehouse_id, warehouse_name, sum(goods_number) as goods_number, sum(quantity) as quantity, refund_created_time, return_order_created_time, refund_id, order_sn, is_manual, return_status, order_goods_id, refund_updated_time, created_time, last_updated_time from after_sale_return_order where shop_name = #{shopName} and last_updated_time >= #{startTime} and last_updated_time < #{endTime} and warehouse_name in ('成都哆劢掂品牌盒损仓', '成都哆劢掂品牌残品仓', '成都哆劢掂品牌正品仓', '成都品牌正品仓-圆通云仓 ', '成都品牌残品仓-圆通云仓', '成都品牌盒损仓-圆通云仓', '品牌正品仓-成都美邦达', '品牌盒损仓-成都美邦达', '品牌残品仓-成都美邦达') and after_sales_status = 10 and return_status = 'DONE' group by platform_order_sn,outer_id
